name: macOS Big Sur App Icons
description:
At WWDC20, we saw the release of macOS Big Sur that had a UI overhaul. As a part of that, Apple has updated most of it's app icons with a new shadow based look. 

Here is our try at recreating some of the new app icons in Big Sur. Go ahead and duplicate it to see how the shapes and shadows are made in Figma.
P.S.: This was made only to experiment with the shadows used. No copyright infringement intended.
